testCase.name: <RepoCard /> should render and match the snapshot
<RepoCard /> should contain 1 RepoCard component
<RepoCard /> should render the repository details inside the card
<RepoCard /> should render the repository unavailable messages in case any props are unavailable or have falsy values
<Header /> should render and match the snapshot
<Header /> should contain logo
ItunesContainer selector tests should select the global state
ItunesContainer selector tests should select the homeContainer state
<HomeContainer /> tests should render and match the snapshot
<HomeContainer /> tests should call dispatchClearGithubRepos on empty change
<HomeContainer /> tests should call dispatchGithubRepos on change and after enter
<HomeContainer /> tests should call dispatchGithubRepos on submit
<HomeContainer /> tests should dispatchGithubRepos on update on mount if repoName is already persisted
<HomeContainer /> tests should validate mapDispatchToProps actions
<HomeContainer /> tests should render default error message when search goes wrong
<HomeContainer /> tests should render the default message when searchBox is empty and reposError is null
<HomeContainer /> tests should render the data when loading becomes false
<HomeContainer /> tests should render exact number of RepoCards as per totalCount in result
<HomeContainer /> tests should redirect to /stories when clicked on Clickable component
<HomeContainer /> tests should render Skeleton Comp when "loading" is true
ItunesContainer saga tests should start task to watch for DEFAULT_ACTION action
ItunesContainer saga tests should ensure that default function is dispatched when the API call succeeds
<App /> container tests should render and match the snapshot
<ProtectedRoute /> should render and match the snapshot
<ProtectedRoute /> should render the component if user logged in and access protected route
<ProtectedRoute /> should not render component if user is not logged in
<ProtectedRoute /> should render component , not logged in, unprotected route
<ProtectedRoute /> should redirect to the dashboard if logged in and accessing login page(unprotected)
HomeContainer saga tests should start task to watch for REQUEST_GET_GITHUB_REPOS action
HomeContainer saga tests should ensure that the action FAILURE_GET_GITHUB_REPOS is dispatched when the api call fails
HomeContainer saga tests should ensure that the action SUCCESS_GET_GITHUB_REPOS is dispatched when the api call succeeds

configureStore params should call window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__

<Clickable /> component tests should contain 1 Clickable component

<Clickable /> component tests should call the prop onClick when the clickable component is clicked
<T /> component tests should render and match the snapshot
<T /> component tests should contain 1 T component
<T /> component tests should contain render the text according to the id
<T /> component tests should have a margin-bottom of 5px when we pass marginBottom as 5
<For /> should render the number of elements passed as props
<For /> should render the number of elements passed as props and the parent should be a span
<For /> should render the number of elements passed as props and should not add another layer of dom nesting
<For /> should not render anything when items is not passed

checkStore should not throw if passed valid store shape
checkStore should throw if passed invalid store shape

Tests for LanguageProvider actions changes the locale

Tests for getCurrentRouteDetails method should return null of the route if pathname is not in routeConstants

Tests for isLocal method should return false if when process.env.IS_LOCAL is not present
Tests for isLocal method should return false if process.env.IS_LOCAL has exceptional value
